1. a to the power of m cross times a to the power of n equals a to the power of m plus n end exponent
2. space square root of open parentheses a cross times b close parentheses end root equals square root of a cross times square root of b
3. space to the power of g log open parentheses a. b close parentheses space equals to the power of g log space a plus to the power of g log space b
